sentences.en: Any new company is seen as an invader in an already competitive market.
sentences.cn: 任何一家新的公司都被看成是对原本已充满激烈竞争的市场的入侵.

sentences.en: Any new company is seen as invader an already competitive market.
sentences.cn: 任何一家新公司都被看作是竞争已很激烈的市场的入侵者.

sentences.en: At least one notorious invader, however, wins out by poisoning the competition.
sentences.cn: 不过, 有一种恶名昭彰的侵入种, 是藉由毒害竞争对手而取胜.

sentences.en: During the occupation, we had to live in total submission ( to the invader ).
sentences.cn: 在沦陷时期, 我们得听凭(侵略者的 ) 摆布.

sentences.en: If you like his work, you can even buy Space Invader clothing, shoes, and pictures.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢他的作品, 你甚至可以购买spaceinvader的衣服, 鞋子, 绘画作品.

sentences.en: No matter when the invader comes, they will be wiped out clean.
sentences.cn: 不管侵略者什麽时候来, 都必被消灭.

sentences.en: Now let us learn how a virgin goddess punished an invader of her privacy.
sentences.cn: 下面的故事讲的是童贞女神如何惩罚侵犯她个人自由的人.

sentences.en: Space Invader has traveled to places like Dhaka , Bangladesh; Mombasa , Kenya, and Istanbul, Turkey.
sentences.cn: SpaceInvader 被放置孟加拉国的达卡, 肯尼亚的蒙巴萨, 土耳其的伊斯坦布尔.

sentences.en: The invader decided to withdraw because of villagers'five months of stubborn resistance.
sentences.cn: 侵略者受到村民长达五个月的顽强抵抗,决定撤退.

sentences.en: The invader had prepared for this compaign as carefully as he had for larger ones.
sentences.cn: 入侵者对这一次战役,也和对较大规模的战役一样经过精密的准备.

sentences.en: The invader sensed an undercurrent of resentment among the crowd.
sentences.cn: 不速之客在人群中察觉到一丝仇恨的暗流.

sentences.en: The invader thrust the blade of his bayonet into the woman's heart.
sentences.cn: 侵略兵把刺刀的刀身刺入那个妇人的心脏.

sentences.en: The invader will arrive at dawn.
Unfortunately, a related viral invader, the SARS corona virus , reared its ugly head in early 2003.
sentences.cn: 但不幸的是, 另一种入侵的相关病毒, sars冠状病毒, 却在2003年初肆虐一时.

sentences.en: We laughed our heads off when we heard of the invader's failure.
sentences.cn: 当我们听到侵略者失败的消息时,我欢呼起来.

trans.tran_cn: 侵略者，侵入者，侵犯者，侵入物
trans.tran_en: a soldier or a group of soldiers that enters a country or town by force in order to take control of it
